item.title: REDtalks #21 - Super-NetOps Live Q&A
item.description: UPDATE: incase you missed it, see a recording of the “What is Super-NetOps Live Q&A” here:Â https://youtu.be/qFbmiVrvxlE On October 24th, at 9am PST (UTC -7) we will be hosting a Live Q&A forum on Super-NetOps (NetOps for DevOps) - click on the video below for details, or open directly on YouTube here.
